title: Update contact & social links (WhatsApp numbers, Gmail, WhatsApp Channel, YouTube) across homepage, footer, floating button, and SEO schema

requirements.summary: Update homepage Contact section to show both WhatsApp numbers, Gmail, and clickable WhatsApp/YouTube channel links with safe external-link handling.
acceptanceCriteria: On the homepage Contact section, users can see and click both WhatsApp numbers (as tel: and/or wa.me links) and the Gmail address (mailto: link).
The WhatsApp Channel and YouTube Channel are visible and clickable in the Contact section.
The WhatsApp Channel and YouTube Channel links open in a new tab and include rel="noopener noreferrer".

file_operations.description: Centralize contact/social constants (WhatsApp numbers 9435212145 and 9126026463, Gmail nathcybercafe9@gmail.com, WhatsApp Channel URL, YouTube Channel URL, and derived wa.me links) to keep Contact section, footer, floating button, and SEO schema consistent.

Update the static contact info block to display: both phone numbers as tel: links (tel:9435212145 and tel:9126026463) with readable formatting (e.g., show “91260 26463”), Gmail as a mailto:nathcybercafe9@gmail.com link, plus WhatsApp Channel and YouTube Channel links that open in a new tab with rel="noopener noreferrer". Prefer importing values from frontend/src/constants/contact.ts.

requirements.summary: Update Site footer social links and Contact subsection with new YouTube/WhatsApp channel URLs and both WhatsApp numbers + Gmail, using safe external-link handling.
acceptanceCriteria: Footer social icon/links include YouTube and WhatsApp Channel URLs provided by the user.
Footer Contact area shows both WhatsApp numbers and the Gmail address with correct link schemes (tel:/wa.me/mailto:).
All external footer links open in a new tab and include rel="noopener noreferrer".

file_operations.description: Update footer social links area to include YouTube Channel and WhatsApp Channel links (target="_blank" + rel="noopener noreferrer"), and update the Contact subsection to include both WhatsApp numbers (tel: and/or wa.me links) and Gmail (mailto:). Prefer importing values from frontend/src/constants/contact.ts.

requirements.summary: Ensure the floating WhatsApp button targets one of the provided WhatsApp numbers (default to 9435212145) and remains consistent with displayed contact info, opening safely in a new tab.
acceptanceCriteria: The floating WhatsApp button opens a wa.me chat to a number that is listed on the site (9435212145 or 91260 26463).
The floating WhatsApp button link opens in a new tab with rel="noopener noreferrer" and still includes the prefilled message text.

file_operations.description: Set the floating button destination to the preferred default WhatsApp number (9435212145) using the wa.me format, ensure it matches the number displayed elsewhere, and keep target="_blank" + rel="noopener noreferrer" and the prefilled message text. Prefer importing values from frontend/src/constants/contact.ts.

requirements.summary: Update LocalBusiness JSON-LD in the Seo component to include both phone numbers and the new YouTube/WhatsApp channel URLs as social profile links.
acceptanceCriteria: The rendered JSON-LD LocalBusiness schema includes both phone numbers (9435212145 and 91260 26463) in a valid way.
The schema includes the YouTube and WhatsApp channel URLs as social profile links (e.g., sameAs array).
No console errors are produced due to invalid JSON-LD formatting.

file_operations.description: Update the injected LocalBusiness JSON-LD to include both phone numbers (use a valid multi-value representation, such as an array), and add the YouTube Channel and WhatsApp Channel URLs to sameAs. Prefer importing values from frontend/src/constants/contact.ts and ensure JSON.stringify output remains valid to avoid console errors.
